languages.text: "По вокс-связи транслируется призыв к силам Инквизиции от лица династии Чорда. Она предлагает им сложить оружие под гарантию безопасности".
"House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."
languages.original_text: "По вокс-связи транслируется призыв к силам Инквизиции от лица династии Чорда. Она предлагает им сложить оружие под гарантию безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "The vox-channel transmits a call from the Chorda dynasty to the forces of the Inquisition. They guarantee safety in exchange for laying arms down."
"The vox-channel transmits a call from the Chorda dynasty to the forces of the Inquisition. They guarantee safety in exchange for laying arms down."
"The vox-channel transmits a call on behalf of the Chorda dynasty to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they lay down their arms."
"The vox-channel transmits a call on behalf of the Chorda dynasty to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they lay down their arms."
"House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."

languages.text: “库尔达家族通过库尔达频道向审判庭的部队喊话，说只要审判庭的部队立刻投降，就会保障他们的人身安全。”
languages.original_text: "House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."

traits.locale_text: “库尔达家族通过库尔达频道向审判庭的部队喊话，说只要审判庭的部队立刻投降，就会保障他们的人身安全。”

languages.text: « La maison Chorda diffuse un appel-vox à l'attention des troupes de l'Inquisition. Elle leur promet qu'il ne leur sera fait aucun mal si elles se rendent sans résister. »
languages.original_text: "House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Chorda diffuse un appel-vox à l'attention des troupes de l'Inquisition. Elle leur promet qu'il ne leur sera fait aucun mal si elles se rendent sans résister. »

languages.text: "Haus Chorda überträgt eine Vox-Nachricht an die Truppen der Inquisition. Das Haus garantiert ihnen Sicherheit, wenn sie sich augenblicklich ergeben."
languages.original_text: "House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Chorda überträgt eine Vox-Nachricht an die Truppen der Inquisition. Das Haus garantiert ihnen Sicherheit, wenn sie sich augenblicklich ergeben."

languages.text: «La casa Chorda está emitiendo un mensaje de voco para las fuerzas de la Inquisición. Garantizan su seguridad si se rinden de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Chorda está emitiendo un mensaje de voco para las fuerzas de la Inquisición. Garantizan su seguridad si se rinden de inmediato».

languages.text: 「チョーダ家が異端審問庁に、ヴォクスコールを送信している。直ちに降伏すれば安全を保証する」
languages.original_text: "House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダ家が異端審問庁に、ヴォクスコールを送信している。直ちに降伏すれば安全を保証する」

languages.text: "Chorda Hanesi, Engizisyon kuvvetlerine bir voks çağrısı gönderiyor. Derhâl teslim olmaları hâlinde güvenliklerini temin ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "House Chorda is transmitting a vox-call to the Inquisition forces. They guarantee safety if they surrender at once."
